textAfterTable: It's good to be the king, as Ari Gold well knows. Now you can enter the kingdom with the Entourage King Ari T-Shirt. Featuring a unique King Ari insignia on printed across the chest, this stylish tee rules over all others. There can only be one King, and it's Ari -- but you get in his court with the Entourage King Ari T-Shirt. S M L XL XXL Shirt Length 28" 29" 30" 31" 32" Shirt Width 18.5" 20" 21.5" 23.5" 25.5" REVIEW SNAPSHOT® by PowerReviews DA - HBO Entourage King Ari T-Shirt   3.6 (based on 5 reviews) 100% of respondents would recommend this to a friend.
